title: High Alcohol Consumption Among Males
description: In 2020, Romanian males aged 15 and above consumed an average of 27.03 liters of pure alcohol per capita, one of the highest rates globally.

title: Significant Economic Growth for the Bottom 40%
description: In 2022, the bottom 40% of Romania's population experienced an annualized growth rate of 11.42% in per capita real survey mean consumption or income, indicating substantial economic progress.

title: Overall Economic Growth
description: Romania's total population saw an annualized growth rate of 8.85% in per capita real survey mean consumption or income in 2022, reflecting robust economic development.

title: Low Arms Exports
description: In 2023, Romania's arms exports were valued at 1,000,000 SIPRI trend indicator values, placing it among the countries with the lowest arms exports globally.

title: High Alcohol Consumption Per Capita
description: In 2020, Romania's total alcohol consumption per capita was 16.8 liters, ranking among the highest globally.

title: Moderate Control of Corruption
description: In 2023, Romania's control of corruption standard error was 0.1449, indicating a moderate level of uncertainty in corruption control measures.
